details: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
Optimized API performance, reducing response time by 60%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Implemented CI/CD pipelines improving deployment efficiency by 80%
Collaborated with product team to define technical requirements
Built and maintained multiple client-facing web applications
Developed RESTful APIs with comprehensive documentation
Improved application security implementing OAuth 2.0
Reduced page load times by 40% through optimization
Participated in agile development process and sprint planning
Contributed to frontend development of company's main product
Fixed bugs and implemented new features based on user feedback
Wrote unit tests improving code coverage to 80%
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Learned best practices in software development
Delivered custom web solutions for various clients
Built responsive websites and web applications
Managed client relationships and project timelines
Provided ongoing maintenance and support
Gained experience in multiple technologies and frameworks
